scripts.install:clean: npm run install:pre && npm install && npm run install:post
scripts.test:all: npm run test:pre && if not exist "results\automated scripts", mkdir "results\automated scripts" && npm run tests:run && npm run test:post
scripts.test:all-ubuntu: npm run test:pre && mkdir -p "results/automated scripts" && npm run tests:run && npm run test:post
scripts.test:all-ci: mkdir -p 'results/automated scripts' && npm run cucumber tests
scripts.test:all-ci-windows-parallel: if not exist "results\automated scripts", mkdir "results\automated scripts" && npm run cucumber-parallel tests
scripts.test:all-ci-windows: if not exist "results\automated scripts", mkdir "results\automated scripts" && npm run cucumber tests
